dataset.title: Business Certificate Holders List
dataset.description:
The dataset includes key components that are needed for WHD to process labor certificates under special categories.  Certificates pertain to both Section 14 and farm labor.

The list contains the name and physical address of the certificate holder, as well as the status and date of the employer’s most recent certification. The list also contains the certificate number generated by the Wage and Hour Division.

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour Division

dataset.title: Community Rehabilitation Programs (CRPs) List
dataset.description:
The listed employers hold certificates issued under section 14(c) of the Fair Labor Standards Act. The certificates authorize the payment of special minimum wages, wages that are less than the federal minimum wage, to workers who have disabilities that impair their productivity for the work being performed. This list is current as of November 1, 2013.

The list contains the name and physical address of the certificate holder, as well as the status and date of the employer’s most recent certification. The list also contains the certificate number generated by the Wage and Hour Division.

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour Division

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour Division

dataset.title: Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Protection Act (MSPA) Registered Farm Labor Contractor Listing
dataset.description: Migrant and Seasonal Agricultural Protection Act (MSPA) Registered Farm Labor Contractor Listing: The MSPA requires a contractor to obtain federal certification prior to performing any farm labor contracting activities. The farm labor contractors who appear on the following list have obtained a federal certificate. More information and details about the data provided can be found at http://explore.data.gov/Agriculture/Migrant-and-Seasonal-Agricultural-Protection-Act-M/bsvf-3e67

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour Division

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour Division

dataset.title: Wage and Hour Division Compliance Action Data
dataset.description: The dataset contains all concluded WHD compliance actions since FY 2005. The dataset includes whether any violations were found and the back wage amount, number of employees due back wages, and civil money penalties assessed. More information and details about the data provided can be found at http://www.dol.gov/whd/

publisher.name: U.S. Department of Labor Wage and Hour Division

dataset.title: Wage and Wage Determination Data
dataset.description: The dataset includes wage data and the calculation and publication of wage determinations.  The set also includes survey data (from the Census, Regional Analysts and Specialists and the Web) to the Automated Survey Data System.  Wage decisions are published by wage areas, construction type and location.
